head.supplied: The Free German Academy ¶ for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in ¶ Goethe's parental home ¶ to Dr. med. and phil. Ferd. Baron von Mueller Mr.F.D.H. ¶ Government Botanist at present councilor of th...

div.p: From the Freies Deutsches Hochstift
RB MSS M200a.45, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: A copy of the MS in the archives of the Freies Deutsches Hochstift has the annotation: 'Abschrift versandt 24//XI. 1879' [copy sent 24 November 1879].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. med et phil. Ferd. Baron von Müller Mr.F.D.H. Government-Botanist

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: d. Z. Stiftsrath des Freien Deutschen Hochstiftes Melbourne (Victoria. Australien)

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Frankfurt a. M., den 7 Heumonates 1879.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Sendung vom (Poststempel 15/VI) d. J. mit welcher Sie die Güte, uns Ihre

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Suggestions on the Maintenance, Creation and Enrichement of Forests mitzutheilen,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
p.seg: danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: für die Verwaltung:

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.p: Dr. G H Otto Volger gen. Senckenberg Mr.F.D.H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: The Free German Academy

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Goethe's parental home

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr. med. and phil. Ferd. Baron von Mueller Mr.F.D.H.
Meister des Freies Deutsches Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. Government Botanist at present councilor of the Free German Academy Melbourne Australia

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
Frankfurt on Main, 7 Hay-month
i.e. July.
1879

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of (postmarked 15/VI) this year with which you had the goodness to send us

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Suggestions on the maintenance, creation and enrichment of forests,
B79.05.06.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Respectfully signed

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: for the administration

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

cell.p: Dr G.H. Otto Volger called Senckenberg Mr.F.D.H.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Zerle

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Secretary
